sn48.54:1: "Bhikkhus, just as the footprints of all living beings that walk fit into the footprint of the elephant, and the elephant's footprint is declared to be their chief by reason of its size, so too, among the steps that lead to enlightenment,[n.239] Yani kanici padani bodhāya saṁvattanti.Spk: Whatever Dhamma-steps(dhammapadani), sections of Dhamma(dhammakoṭṭhasa), lead to enlightenment.the faculty of wisdom is declared to be their chief, that is, for the attainment of enlightenment.
